fields.title: Tire Chains
fields.description: Get better traction in cold weather with tire chains . Try the best snow chains for your car.

fields.title: Car Insurance
fields.description: Super Collision Damage Waiver insurance with Zero Excess. The lessee still remains responsible for the 25% of the car value in case of car theft or total loss damage.

fields.title: Additionel Driver
fields.description: Share the driving: journeys are always better when you can take turns at the wheel!

fields.title: Baby Seat-B
fields.description:
Forward-facing baby seat suitable for
Age: 1-6 years

fields.title: Satellite Navigation
fields.description: Satellite navigation system provides turn-by-turn direction.
